html: #BeatPlasticPollution by switching to steel or glass bottles today! Plastic bottles take 450 years or more to decompose, harming us and our environment. I’m now one step closer towards purging plastic from my life. Hope you guys will make the switch too!#LetsCoexist @deespeakpic.twitter.com/VyI70hggRv

html: Finding plastic in the Marina trench, 10,898 meters below the surface of the water, reveals how human activities on land have devastating consequences to life below water. Together, we can #BeatPlasticPollution #SayNoToPlastic @deespeakpic.twitter.com/cB8BTldYhf
text:
Finding plastic in the Marina trench, 10,898 meters below the surface of the water, reveals how human activities on land have devastating consequences to life below water. 

Together, we can #BeatPlasticPollution
#SayNoToPlastic @deespeakpic.twitter.com/cB8BTldYhf
